transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan namaskar sir. 

Executive: Namaste namaste bas baat badhiya sir.

Executive: Sir aapka ek complaint hai sir IndiaMART aapne customer care ko phone kiya tha sir.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Kya issue aa rahi hai sir bataiye sir usko resolve kiya jaye.

Customer: Usme wo party ke reason se hamari system band hui hui hai. 

Customer: Lekin hum abhi company par gaye nahi hai lekin kal jane wale hai. 

Customer: Kal ja ya parso ki me aapko call karunga. 

Executive: Thik hai? Nahi nahi abhi abhi sir aapko kaha system company to chalu hai sir aap valid bhi use kar rahe hai.

Customer: Valid kya use ho rahi hai dekh lo.

Executive: Sir sir service to kahi roka hi nahi gaya hai sir aapki service valid aapko usme pop up nahi aa rahi hai. 

Customer: Bank statement ka pop up aa raha hai. 

Customer: Aisa kyu aa raha hai? Kab hamari teen din se hamari ye jo hai wo to band hai.

Executive: Kab aapne sir khola tha sir IndiaMART last?

Customer: Maine to har roz kholta hu lekin wo band aati hai. 

Executive: Mobile me kholiye. Ek bar mobile me kholiye sir mere kehne pe.

Customer: Haan khol la lo.

Customer: Bank detail mang raha hai bank detail kiske liye chahiye?

Executive: Bank detail sir aapka hoga na sir.

Customer: To wo kiske liye mang rahi hai?

Executive: Sir bank detail IndiaMART me aapko update karna padta hai sir apna bank detail aap update karoge sir IndiaMART me.

Customer: Update kar dunga to chalu ho jayega aisa hai?

Executive: Bilkul sir aap bank detail daliye apne. 

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Daliye sir me line pe hu daliye sir usko resolve karte hai line pe reh ke.

Customer: Aisa hai? Ruko to me dal Hello na. 

Executive: Ji aap bol hi rahe ho. 

Customer: Kyuki ye teen din se band aa raha hai maine socha wo party ka ek payment atka hua tha thik hai uski wajah se aa raha hai. 

Executive: Nahi.

Customer: Aur usko kal hum payment kar denge to usme kya karna padega?

Executive: Kya sir?

Customer: Me party ko payment kar du thik hai. 

Customer: To usme IndiaMART ko kuch dena padega?

Executive: Nahi nahi sir kya issue kuch resolve kuch issue hai kya buyer se aapke beech me? 

Customer: Usme aisa tha Diwali pehle unka order liya hua tha thik hai. 

Executive: Achha.

Customer: Lekin hamara ek jo customer ye hamara jo waha jo banda kam kar raha wo expired ho gaya tha. 

Customer: Is wajah se hum unko de nahi paye the to humne bola ki bhai aapko hum Diwali ke baad chalu karenge thik hai aapka payment jo hai wo hum aapko release kar denge.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Aur koi issue nahi hai. 

Executive: Thik hai wo sir.

Customer: Hmm?

Executive: Thik hai wo sir.

Customer: Hum kal jane wale hai to wo kar denge payment. 

Customer: Fir IndiaMART ko kuch dena padega hame kaise payment kiya kya nahi hai. 

Executive: Aap aur buyer aur aapke beech sir IndiaMART kya karegi sir.

Executive: Jab tak buyer aur aap me se koi complaint nahi karega hum beech me interfere nahi karte sir. 

Executive: Aapko koi issue hai buyer se to aap bataiye buyer ko agar issue aap se hai to buyer hame batayega tab hum beech me interfere karenge. 

Customer: Koi baat nahi chalo me bank detail add kar leta hu ruko. 

Executive: Bank detail add kariye sir line pe hu me. 

Customer: Haan line pe hu.

Customer: 106563

Customer: Chalu rakhna hai sir?

Executive: Haan sir kya keh rahe hai?

Customer: 3110

Customer: Haan wo account number wo sab dal diya. 

Customer: Aisa. 

Customer: Nageshwar park

Customer: Submit kar diya. 

Customer: Kaha gaya?

Executive: Khul gaya sir?

Customer: Haan khul gaya.

Executive: Haan sir bas chota sa kam tha sir.

Customer: Haan khul gaya ha sir.

Executive: Keh raha hu sir ab to IndiaMART khul gaya na aapka?

Customer: Haan khul gaya thik hai.

Executive: Me keh raha hu sir ek jo jo complaint aapne ki thi IndiaMART use abhi band kar raha hu sir. 

Customer: Kya?

Executive: Keh raha hu jo aapne complaint IndiaMART pe customer care pe call karte ho na wo aapke complaint ho jata hai sir. 

Customer: Haan. Acha sir band kar raha hu. 

Executive: Thik hai? Okay okay dhanyavad dhanyavad. jayega sir mere naam ka. 

Executive: Uska sir please aap kuch uska. Kya sir? Haan udhar de deta hu. 

Executive: Sir ek bar aache se sir ek bar feedback de dijiye mujhe. Thik hai? Okay okay. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- System was not working.

- Bank details were being asked.

- Payment to be made to the party.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to update bank details.

- IndiaMART account started working after updating details.

- Closed the complaint.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- bank details, payment, complaint, account
